action_item: Users & Roles - Personalize the application settings for user experience improvements.
notes: Focus on landing page preferences and inbox cleanup to enhance daily workflow.

action_item: Users & Roles - Upgrade patient search functionality by unchecking the legacy search box.
notes: This will allow searching by multiple criteria like first name, last name, and gender.

action_item: Security - Change the main login password for enhanced security.
notes: Use the Change Password feature in the settings tab.

action_item: Security - Update the eSignature ID for electronic signing of documents.
notes: Follow the two-step process for validation before creating a new ID.

action_item: Security - Update the visual signature used in documents.
notes: Validate with eSignature ID before drawing a new signature.

action_item: Reports - Customize clinical document templates using CCDA standards.
notes: Select and order sections like allergies, medications, and lab results for patient summaries.
